meanings.definition: A thin sheath worn over the penis during sexual intercourse as a contraceptive or as a protection against infection.
meanings.sent1: He always carries a condom in his wallet.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pack of condoms from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The condom was like a shield against unwanted consequences.
meanings.sent4: The condom was a safety net in the heat of the moment.
meanings.sent5: The shiny condom gleamed in the dim light of the bedroom.

meanings.definition: A similar device worn over the cervix by a woman during sexual intercourse.
meanings.sent1: She made sure to use a condom every time.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how to properly use a condom.
meanings.sent3: The condom was her trusted ally in the battle against risks.
meanings.sent4: Her condom was a silent protector in the night.
meanings.sent5: The colorful condom added a touch of fun to their intimacy.
